title: travelplanner: Can you assist in creating a comprehensive 5-day travel plan for a group of 7? We'll be starting our journey in Washington, planning to discover 2 cities in New York from March 23rd to March 27th, 2022. A budget of $9,100 is allocated for this trip. Our accommodation preferences are geared toward securing entire rooms. For transportation, we have decided to avoid self-driving. In terms of dining options, we are eager to savor a variety of cuisines, including American, Mexican, Chinese, and Italian. (54f7309d22dd5b29)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

chat_history.content:
I currently don't have the capability to directly search for train schedules. However, I can help you with other travel-related information such as flights, accommodations, attractions, and more. For train schedules, I recommend checking the official websites of train service providers like Amtrak or using travel booking platforms that include train schedules.

If you need help with anything else, feel free to ask!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Buffalo, New York:

1. **The Buffalo Zoo**
   - Address: 300 Parkside Ave, Buffalo, NY 14214, USA
   - Phone: (716) 837-3900
   - Website: [buffalozoo.org](http://www.buffalozoo.org/)

2. **Buffalo and Erie County Botanical Gardens**
   - Address: 2655 South Park Ave, Buffalo, NY 14218, USA
   - Phone: (716) 827-1584
   - Website: [buffalogardens.com](https://www.buffalogardens.com/)

3. **Buffalo AKG Art Museum**
   - Address: 1285 Elmwood Ave, Buffalo, NY 14222, USA
   - Phone: (716) 882-8700
   - Website: [buffaloakg.org](https://buffaloakg.org/)

4. **Canalside**
   - Address: 44 Prime St, Buffalo, NY 14202, USA
   - Website: [buffalowaterfront.com](http://www.buffalowaterfront.com/)

5. **Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site**
   - Address: 641 Delaware Ave, Buffalo, NY 14202, USA
   - Phone: (716) 884-0095
   - Website: [trsite.org](http://trsite.org/)

6. **Buffalo Naval Park**
   - Address: 1 Naval, Marina Park S, Buffalo, NY 14202, USA
   - Phone: (716) 847-1773
   - Website: [buffalonavalpark.org](http://buffalonavalpark.org/)

7. **Buffalo Museum of Science**
   - Address: 1020 Humboldt Pkwy, Buffalo, NY 14211, USA
   - Phone: (716) 896-5200
   - Website: [sciencebuff.org](https://www.sciencebuff.org/)

8. **Delaware Park**
   - Address: 84 Parkside Ave, Buffalo, NY 14214, USA
   - Phone: (716) 838-1249
   - Website: [bfloparks.org](http://www.bfloparks.org/index.php/parks/delaware)

9. **Lafayette Square**
   - Address: 415 Main St, Buffalo, NY 14203, USA
   - Phone: (716) 851-5553

10. **Frank Lloyd Wright's Martin House**
    - Address: 125 Jewett Pkwy, Buffalo, NY 14214, USA
    - Phone: (716) 856-3858
    - Website: [martinhouse.org](https://martinhouse.org/)

11. **Buffalo Harbor State Park**
    - Address: 1111 Fuhrmann Boulevard, Buffalo, NY 14203, USA
    - Phone: (716) 822-1207
    - Website: [parks.ny.gov](https://parks.ny.gov/parks/buffaloharbor/details.aspx)

12. **Buffalo Bricks**
    - Address: Main St, Buffalo, NY 14204, USA
    - Phone: (716) 854-2314
    - Website: [workingfordowntown.org](http://www.workingfordowntown.org/)

13. **Buffalo Heritage Carousel**
    - Address: 44 Prime St, Buffalo, NY 14202, USA
    - Phone: (716) 493-2110
    - Website: [buffaloheritagecarousel.org](https://www.buffaloheritagecarousel.org/)

14. **Michigan Street African American Heritage Corridor**
    - Address: Michigan Ave, Buffalo, NY 14203, USA
    - Phone: (716) 322-1002
    - Website: [michiganstreetbuffalo.org](http://www.michiganstreetbuffalo.org/)

15. **Tifft Nature Preserve**
    - Address: 1200 Fuhrmann Boulevard, Buffalo, NY 14203, USA
    - Phone: (716) 825-6397
    - Website: [tifft.org](https://www.tifft.org/)

16. **Iron Island Museum**
    - Address: 998 E Lovejoy St, Buffalo, NY 14206, USA
    - Phone: (716) 892-3084
    - Website: [ironislandmuseum.com](http://www.ironislandmuseum.com/)

17. **The Electric Tower**
    - Address: 535 Washington St, Buffalo, NY 14203, USA
    - Phone: (716) 633-2096
    - Website: [electrictower.com](http://www.electrictower.com/)

18. **Buffalo Main Light**
    - Address: 1 Fuhrmann Boulevard, Buffalo, NY 14203, USA
    - Phone: (716) 264-1707
    - Website: [Buffalo Lighthouse on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/Buffalo-Lighthouse-245535252134529/)

19. **The Buffalo History Museum**
    - Address: 1 Museum Ct, Buffalo, NY 14216, USA
    - Phone: (716) 873-9644
    - Website: [buffalohistory.org](http://www.buffalohistory.org/)

20. **Buffalo City Hall**
    - Address: 65 Niagara Square, Buffalo, NY 14202, USA
    - Phone: (716) 851-4890
    - Website: [buffalony.gov](http://www.buffalony.gov/)

These attractions offer a variety of experiences, from historical sites and museums to parks and nature preserves. Enjoy your visit to Buffalo!
